author: Kokila Chokkanathan
title: One news and the stock became a storm, 18 percent in a day!
text:
Goldiam [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited, which works in the gems and jewellery sector, has given a huge return to its investors. Till the time of writing the [news](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=NEWS), the shares of this company have climbed up to 18 percent today i.e. on 7 [january](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=JANUARY) 2025. It is believed that this boom has come from an announcement made by the company.
In fact, Goldiam [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited announced today that it has launched a website, where lab-made diamonds will be sold, this website will be completely dedicated to the domestic market. It is believed that this move of the company can give good profit to Goldiam [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) in the future. Apart from this, lab-made diamonds will also be easily accessible to the [people](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=POPULATION) through this website made for domestic retailers.
The stock has given great returns
The shares of Goldiam [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited have given a return of 180 percent to its investors in the last 6 months. At the same time, in the last one year, the company has given a fantastic return of 170 percent to its investors. Till the time of writing the [news](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=NEWS) today, the company's shares have increased by 18.44 percent.
Fundamentals of Goldium [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited
The market [capital](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=CAPITAL) of Goldium [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited is Rs 5,268 crore as of today. The stock PE is 55.8. ROCE is 19.8 percent and ROE is 14.9 percent. The book value of the share is Rs 62.6 and the face value is Rs 2. The all-time high of the company is Rs 494 and the all-time low is Rs 144. The biggest thing is that the company's shares have touched their all-time high today. Till the time of writing the [news](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=NEWS), the price of one share of Goldium [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited is 494.85 paise. If an upper circuit is applied in the shares of Goldium [international](/search/topic?searchType=search&searchTerm=INTERNATIONAL) Limited till the market closes, then further increase in their prices can be seen.
